Uses of Activity in com.beepell.activity
 

Classes in com.beepell.activity that implement Activity
 class AbstractActivity
          Abstract implementation of an BPEL activity.
 

Methods in com.beepell.activity that return Activity
 Activity ActivityFactory.create(Activity configuration)
          Creates an Activity based on a configuration.

Uses of Activity in com.beepell.activity.basic
 

Classes in com.beepell.activity.basic that implement Activity
 class AbstractBasicActivity
           
 class Assign
          Assign Activity.
 class Compensate
          The compensate activity causes all immediately enclosed scopes to be compensated in default order (see section 12.5.2.
 class CompensateScope
          The compensateScope activity causes one specified child scope to be compensated.
 class Empty
          There is often a need to use an activity that does nothing, for example when a fault needs to be caught and suppressed.
 class Exit
           The exit activity is used to immediately end the business process instance.
 class Invoke
           The invoke activity is used to call Web Services offered by service providers ...
 class Receive
           A receive activity specifies the partnerLink that contains the myRole used to receive messages and operation that it expects the partner to invoke.
 class Reply
          Reply Activity.
 class Rethrow
           The rethrow activity is used in fault handlers to rethrow the fault they caught, i.e. the fault name and, where present, the fault data of the original fault.
 class Throw
           The throw activity is used when a business process needs to signal an internal fault explicitly.
 class Validate
          The validate activity can be used to ensure that values of variables are valid against their associated XML data definition, including XML Schema simple type, complex type, element definition and XML definitions of WSDL parts.
 class Wait
           The wait activity specifies a delay for a certain period of time or until a certain deadline is reached (see section 8.3.
 

Uses of Activity in com.beepell.activity.structured
 

Classes in com.beepell.activity.structured that implement Activity
 class AbstractStructuredActivity
           
 class Flow
          The flow activity provides concurrency and synchronization.
 class ForEach
          The forEach activity will execute its contained scope activity exactly N+1 times where N equals the finalCounterValue minus the startCounterValue.
 class If
          If Activity.
 class Pick
          Pick Activity.
 class RepeatUntil
          The repeatUntil activity provides for repeated execution of a contained activity.
 class Scope
          Scope Activity.
 class Sequence
          A sequence activity contains one or more activities that are performed sequentially, in the lexical order in which they appear within the sequence element.
 class While
          The while activity provides for repeated execution of a contained activity.
